dao.name: QRY_SALES_MN
dao.statement: SELECT SALES_COD, SALES_NAM, HOTEL_SALES, BQ_SALES, MEMBER_SALES FROM SALES_MN WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id and trim(CLASS_COD) = trim(:class_cod) ORDER BY SALES_COD

dao.name: CHK_SALES_CLASS_ISEXIST
dao.statement: select count(*) as sales_mn_count from sales_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(class_cod) = trim(:class_cod) and rownum = 1
